description: The month on book from the installment start date. For example, a value of 1 indicates the account's first EMI month.
name: MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE

description: The score from the Early Warning System model.
name: EWS_Model_Score

description: The output band from the Early Warning System model. CRITICAL RULE: For analysis, you MUST use a CASE statement to group the raw values into these exact three bands, ordered from lowest to highest risk: 'Low' (for values R1-R3), 'Medium' (for values R4-R7), and 'High' (for values R8-R10 and above).
name: EWS_Model_Output_Band

description: Unique identifier for the loan agreement, typically an alphanumeric code.
name: AGREEMENTNO

description: The number of days past due at the start of the month.
name: SOM_DPD

description: Indicates the DPD (Days Past Due) bucket of the customer as of the start of the current month. CRITICAL RULE: For analysis, you MUST use these exact buckets: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5+.
name: SOM_DPD_BUCKET

description: The book size at the start of the month.
name: SOM_BOOKSIZE

description: Start of Month Principal Outstanding - the outstanding loan amount at the start of the month.
name: SOM_POS

description: The outstanding overdue charges at the start of the month.
name: SOM_ODCDEBTORS

description: The cheque bounce charges outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_CBCDEBTORS

description: The other charges outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_OTHERDEBTORS

description: Excess money or credit balance at the start of the month.
name: SOM_EXCESSMONEY

description: The total charges due from the customer at the start of the month.
name: SOM_TOTAL_CHARGES_DUE

description: The total overdue amount at the start of the month.
name: SOM_TOTAL_OD_AMT

description: Start-of-Month Non-Performing Asset (NPA) stage. Indicates if the loan is regular, deceased, written-off, or sold (WO_SALE).
name: SOM_NPASTAGEID

description: Unique identifier for the branch where the loan was originated.
name: BRANCHID

description: Name of the branch where the loan was originated.
name: BRANCHNAME

description: The total amount financed, including principal and possibly other capitalized fees.
name: AMOUNTFINANCE

description: Geographical region where the branch is located.
name: REGION

description: The date when the loan amount was disbursed.
name: DISBURSALDATE

description: The scheduled date when the loan will be fully paid off.
name: MATURITYDATE

description: Name of the two-wheeler manufacturer.
name: MANUFACTURERNAME

description: The current month on book calculated from the disbursal date.
name: MOB_ON_DISB_DT

description: Loan-to-Value ratio, representing the loan amount as a percentage of the asset's value.
name: LTV

description: The effective interest rate of the loan.
name: EFFRATE

description: The state of the customer.
name: STATE

description: Name of the dealer or supplier from whom the vehicle was purchased.
name: SUPPLIERNAME

description: The duration of the loan in months.
name: TENURE

description: The total cost of the asset financed.
name: ASSETCOST

description: Model name of the two-wheeler being financed.
name: ASSETNAME

description: The make of the asset financed.
name: ASSETMAKE

description: Current Date Non-Performing Asset (NPA) stage. Indicates if the loan is regular, deceased, written-off, or sold (WO_SALE).
name: NPASTAGEID

description: Principal Outstanding - the current remaining principal balance on the loan.
name: POS

description: The total charges due from the customer.
name: TOTAL_CHARGES_DUE

description: The unique identifier for the supplier.
name: SUPPLIERID

description: The name of the scheme.
name: SCHEMENAME

description: The zipcode of the customer.
name: ZIPCODE

description: The number of EMIs paid by the customer.
name: NO_OF_EMI_PAID

description: The number of EMIs due.
name: NO_EMI_DUE

description: The total number of EMIs for the loan.
name: TOTAL_NO_OF_EMI

description: The occupation of the customer.
name: OCCUPATION

description: The gender of the customer.
name: GENDER

description: The city of the customer.
name: CITY

description: Flag indicating if the loan has been foreclosed ('Y'/'N').
name: FORECLOSE_FLAG

description: Indicates whether a loan matured without any delinquency ('Y'/'N').
name: NON_DELINQUENTMATURED_FLAG

description: The date of the payment.
name: PAYMENT_DATE

description: The month-to-date bounce count.
name: MTD_BOUNCE_COUNT

description: Indicates if a customer bounced on their first EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: When a user asks for 'GNS1', you MUST use this column and MUST apply the filter MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 1
name: GNS1

description: NNS for 1st EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 1st month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 1.
name: NNS1

description: NNS for 2nd EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 2nd month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 2.
name: NNS2

description: NNS for 3rd EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 3rd month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 3.
name: NNS3

description: NNS for 4th EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 4th month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 4.
name: NNS4

description: NNS for 5th EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 5th month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 5.
name: NNS5

description: NNS for 6th EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 6th month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 6.
name: NNS6

description: The total charge collection for the current month.
name: TOTAL_CHARGE_COLLECTION

description: The status of the charge collection.
name: CHARGE_COLLECTION_STATUS

description: Indicates if charges are collected ('Y'/'N').
name: CHARGE_COLLECTION_FLAG

description: The operational date for which the data is relevant. This is the primary date field for filtering time-series data.
name: BUSINESS_DATE

description: Indicator if the borrower is considered a prime customer (better credit quality, 'Y'/'N').
name: PrimeFlag

description: Indicates if the payment has bounced for the current month ('Y'/'N').
name: Bounce_Flag

description: The final amount collected from the customer.
name: Final_COLLECTION_AMOUNT

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 0 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_0LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 1-30 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_1_30LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 31-60 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_31_60LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 61-90 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_61_90LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Categorization of customer's location. CRITICAL RULE: When reporting by TIER, you MUST use these exact group names: 'Tier 1' (for METRO), 'Tier 2' (for URBAN and SEMI_URBAN), and 'Tier 3' (for RURAL).
name: TIER

description: The risk bucket from the Early Warning System model.
name: EWS_Risk_Bucket

description: Indicates the DPD (Days Past Due) bucket of the customer as of the end of the current month. CRITICAL RULE: For analysis, you MUST use these exact buckets: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5+.
name: DPD_BUCKET

description: These are the AMOUNTFINANCE variable as per bands created by different teams. So any ACCOUNTFINANCE related cohorts use this variable directly.
name: AMTFIN_BAND

description: These are the EMI variable as per bands created by different teams. So any EMI related cohorts use this variable directly.
name: EMI_BAND

description: These are the ASSETCOST variable as per bands created by different teams. So any ASSETCOST related cohorts use this variable directly.
name: ASSETCOST_BAND

description: This variable tells the 0+ count for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_0_PLUS_cnt

description: This variable tells the 30+ count for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_30_PLUS_cnt

description: This variable tells the 60+ count for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_60_PLUS_cnt

description: This variable tells the 90+ count for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_90_PLUS_cnt

description: This variable tells the 0+ DPD POS principal outstanding for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_0_PLUS

description: This variable tells the 30+ DPD POS principal outstanding for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_30_PLUS

description: This variable tells the 60+ DPD POS principal outstanding for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_60_PLUS

description: This variable tells the 90+ DPD POS principal outstanding for the portfolio at the current business date.
name: NR_90_PLUS

description: Represents the Principal Outstanding (POS) amount at the current business date, filtered for high-risk accounts. Specifically targets loans where: (1) Delinquency is 30 days or more (30+ DPD) AND (2) Vintage is greater than 3 months (MOB > 3)
name: NR_30_PLUS_3_LAGGED

description: Represents the Principal Outstanding (POS) amount at the current business date, filtered for high-risk accounts. Specifically targets loans where: (1) Delinquency is 90 days or more (90+ DPD) AND (2) Vintage is greater than 3 months (MOB > 3)
name: NR_90_PLUS_3_LAGGED

description: Seasoned Portfolio Exposure: The total Principal Outstanding (POS) for accounts that have been on the book for more than 3 months (MOB > 3). Used to analyze the risk of the mature portfolio, excluding early vintage accounts.
name: DR_PLUS_3_LAGGED

description: Calculates the Principal Outstanding (POS) for accounts in the 31-to-180 day delinquency bucket. This includes accounts where Days Past Due (DPD) is strictly greater than 30 and less than or equal to 180.
name: NR_31_180_PLUS

description: Calculates the Principal Outstanding (POS) for accounts in the 91-to-180 day delinquency bucket (often considered late-stage delinquency). This includes accounts where Days Past Due (DPD) is strictly greater than 90 and less than or equal to 180
name: NR_91_180_PLUS

description: 30+ DPD POS at MOB 3: The Principal Outstanding (POS) of accounts that are 30+ days past due specifically when they are at Month on Book 3.
name: NR_30_PLUS_3MOB

description: 30+ DPD POS at MOB 6: The Principal Outstanding (POS) of accounts that are 30+ days past due specifically when they are at Month on Book 6.30+ DPD POS at MOB 6: The Principal Outstanding (POS) of accounts that are 30+ days past due specifically when they are at Month on Book 6.
name: NR_30_PLUS_6MOB

description: 30+ DPD POS at MOB 6: The Principal Outstanding (POS) of accounts that are 30+ days past due specifically when they are at Month on Book 9.
name: NR_30_PLUS_9MOB

description: 30+ DPD POS at MOB 6: The Principal Outstanding (POS) of accounts that are 30+ days past due specifically when they are at Month on Book 12.
name: NR_30_PLUS_12MOB

description: Disbursals Matured to MOB 3: The original Disbursed Amount for all accounts that have reached exactly Month on Book 3. Used as the denominator for MOB 3 vintage analysis.
name: DR_30_PLUS_3MOB

description: Disbursals Matured to MOB 6: The original Disbursed Amount for all accounts that have reached exactly Month on Book 6. Used as the denominator for MOB 6 vintage analysis.
name: DR_30_PLUS_6MOB

description: Disbursals Matured to MOB 9: The original Disbursed Amount for all accounts that have reached exactly Month on Book 9. Used as the denominator for MOB 9 vintage analysis.
name: DR_30_PLUS_9MOB

description: Disbursals Matured to MOB 12: The original Disbursed Amount for all accounts that have reached exactly Month on Book 12. Used as the denominator for MOB 12 vintage analysis.
name: DR_30_PLUS_12MOB

description: This if the flag for if the customers RC is pending for submission to the company or not. 1 implies RC is pending for submission and 0 implies RC is not pending for submission.
name: RC_PENDING_OVERALL

description: The ID of the FLS. Field level sales executive ID who sourced this loan.
name: FLSID

description: The name of the FLS. Field level sales executive name who sourced this loan.
name: FLSNAME

description: A hierarchical classification assigned by the Credit Team to segment suppliers or dealers based on their risk profile and performance. This is an ordinal variable used for portfolio stratification. Valid values include: 'Bronze', 'Silver', 'Gold', 'Diamond', and 'Platinum' (typically ranked from lowest to highest status
name: Supplier_Categorization__Credit_Team
